task1.question:
The table below gives information related to population growth, average birth per woman, life expectancy at birth in countries with different income level in 2000 and 2004.

Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features and mae comparisons with relevant.

task2.question:
In many countries, mainly tourists, but not local people, visit museums and historical sites.

Why does this happen, and what can be done to attract more local people to visit these places?
